greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Column 1 of triangle A104505, which is equal to the right-hand side of the triangle A084610 of coefficients in (1 + x - x^2)^n.
link: P. Barry, On the Central Coefficients of Bell Matrices, J. Int. Seq. 14 (2011) # 11.4.3, page 8.
formula: a(n) = (-1)^n*n*A007440(n) (reversion of g.f. for Fibonacci numbers).
a(n) = -Sum_{k=0..floor(n/2)} C(n, k)*C(n-k, k+1)*(-1)^k. - _Paul Barry_, May 02 2005
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Mar 11 2005
